htsjdk.samtools
Class CRAMFileReader

java.lang.Object
  htsjdk.samtools.SAMFileReader.ReaderImplementation
      htsjdk.samtools.CRAMFileReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
SamReader.PrimitiveSamReader
public class CRAMFileReader
extends SAMFileReader.ReaderImplementation

BAMFileReader analogue for CRAM files. Supports random access using BAI index file formats.

Author:
vadim

Constructor Detail

CRAMFileReader

public CRAMFileReader(java.io.File file,
                      java.io.InputStream is)
Open CRAM data for reading using either the file or the input stream supplied in the arguments. The default reference fasta file will be used.

Parameters:
file - CRAM file to open
is - CRAM stream to read

CRAMFileReader

public CRAMFileReader(java.io.File file,
                      java.io.InputStream is,
                      ReferenceSource referenceSource)
Open CRAM data for reading using either the file or the input stream supplied in the arguments.

Parameters:
file - CRAM file to read
is - index file to be used for random access
referenceSource - a source of reference sequences

CRAMFileReader

public CRAMFileReader(java.io.File cramFile,
                      java.io.File indexFile,
                      ReferenceSource referenceSource)
Open CRAM file for reading. If index file is supplied than random access will be available.

Parameters:
cramFile - CRAM file to read
indexFile - index file to be used for random access
referenceSource - a source of reference sequences

CRAMFileReader

public CRAMFileReader(java.io.File file,
                      ReferenceSource referenceSource)
